name: Udyr
description:
This game is made in Global Game Jam Vancouver Site 2023  (Theme - Roots)

Remember, you have only one chance to done this. because we don't have "Try again" button when you died in the game.

Remember again, You're going to the Underworld. Don't move too fast. You'll lost your direction.  The button and directions will alternate if you're moving too fast. Because you're human in the Underworld (It's not the bug in any way)

Now, Listen... You're performing the rituals right now. for going to the Underworld, you have to memorize what happened before and why you have to do this... And then press the space bar. (DO NOT FORGET! IT'S VERY IMPORTANT)

Update 

Right Now, The Cutscene was broke. You won't be able to watch the cutscene at the first of game play. So you have to wait a few seconds and then press "Space Bar" to play game.
